H0.text: What animated character does Gene Kelly dance with in the film Anchors Aweigh. Bugs Bunny

H1.text: What animated character does Gene Kelly dance with in the film Anchors Aweigh. Mickey Mouse

H2.text: What animated character does Gene Kelly dance with in the film Anchors Aweigh. Tom Cat

H3.text: What animated character does Gene Kelly dance with in the film Anchors Aweigh. Jerry Mouse

A4.text: In the 1945 Gene Kelly MGM musical film Anchors Aweigh, Jerry appears as the young ruler of a kingdom where music is banned because he feels he lacks talent, and Kelly persuades the mouse into performing a song-and-dance number with him.

A5.text: Kelly and MGM had originally wanted Walt Disney's Mickey Mouse as Kelly's dance partner for the sequence, but Disney was unwilling to license the character.
